recipe.title: Spicy Sichuan Peanut Sauce
ingredients: 1 1/2 teaspoons Asian chili paste* or 1 teaspoon dried hot red pepper flakes or to taste
1 tablespoon hoisin sauce*, or to taste
*available at Asian markets, some specialty foods shops, and supermarkets
instructions: In a blender or food processor blend all ingredients with salt to taste until smooth. Transfer sauce to a jar with a tight-fitting lid. Peanut sauce keeps, covered and chilled, 1 week.

To use peanut sauce: Boil 1 pound Asian noodles or spaghetti until al dents and drain in a colander. Rinse noodles under cold water until cool and drain. Toss noodles with about 3/4 cup sauce and finely chopped scallion to taste. Serves 4 to 6.
